name: Arc Edge
flavor: The dark heart of Willbreaker burns within this blade.

name: Arc Infinite Edge
flavor: There are few companions truer than a well-honed weapon. Treasure it.

name: Bolt-Caster
flavor: With your own hands you forged the mighty Bolt-Caster. Now take it in hand and unleash its thunder.

name: Dark-Drinker
flavor: With your own hands you forged the mighty Dark-Drinker. Now take it in hand and slake its thirst.

name: Dreadfang
flavor: Kingly brother, I thank you for the gift of your failure. The sword logic demands a pinnacle.

name: Raze-Lighter
flavor: With your own hands you forged the mighty Raze-Lighter. Now take it in hand and feed its flames.

name: Sol Edge
flavor: This reforged shard of Willbreaker wavers on the edge of Light and Dark.

name: Sol Infinite Edge
flavor: Two blades are better than one.

name: Void Edge
flavor: The Hadium metal of what was once Willbreaker courses with conflicting energies.

name: Void Infinite Edge
flavor: As unbreakable as the bond between comrades in arms.

name: The Young Wolf's Howl
flavor: "To the first of the new Iron Lords." â€”Lord Saladin
